author: Karol Terejlis
description: Made to resemble the colours of the Ukrainian flag which is said to represent a blue sky over a yellow field of wheat, a reflection of Ukraine being considered Europe's breadbasket. The sunflower is the Ukrainian national flower so the flag also represents a blue sky over sunflowers.
name: Zelenskyy Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
Separately, STIR vodka and blue curaçao with ice and strain over burnt-yellow layer in glass
